mapper.select: /*decideMapper.selectDecideMain*/ SELECT B.BU_NO AS buNo, B.BU_TITLE AS buTitle, B.BU_ADDRESS AS buAddress, H.MAIN_IMG AS mainImg, (SELECT ROUND(AVG(V.STAR_SCORE), 1) FROM BUSINESS B INNER JOIN ROOM R ON B.BU_NO = R.BU_NO INNER JOIN HOUSE H ON B.BU_TITLE = H.BU_TITLE INNER JOIN REVIEW V ON V.USING_ROOM = R.ROOM_NO WHERE H.MAIN_IMG IS NOT NULL AND B.APPROVAL = 'Y' AND B.BU_NO = #{buNo} ) AS starScore FROM BUSINESS B INNER JOIN ROOM R ON B.BU_NO = R.BU_NO INNER JOIN HOUSE H ON B.BU_TITLE = H.BU_TITLE LEFT JOIN REVIEW V ON V.USING_ROOM = R.ROOM_NO WHERE H.MAIN_IMG IS NOT NULL AND B.APPROVAL = 'Y' AND B.BU_NO = #{buNo} AND ROWNUM = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BUSINESS B INNER JOIN ROOM R ON B.BU_NO = R.BU_NO INNER JOIN REVIEW V ON V.USING_ROOM = R.ROOM_NO WHERE B.BU_NO = #{BU_NO}

/*decideMapper.selectDecideRoom*/ SELECT R.ROOM_NO AS roomNo, B.BU_NO AS buNo, R.ROOM_H_COUNT AS roomHCount, R.ROOM_PRICE AS roomPrice, R.ROOM_NAME AS roomName, R.ROOM_INFO AS roomInfo, IMG.FILE_PATH AS filePath, IMG.SAVE_NAME AS saveName, IMG.FILE_LEVEL AS fileLevel FROM ROOM R LEFT JOIN ROOM_IMG IMG ON R.ROOM_NO = IMG.ROOM_NO INNER JOIN BUSINESS B ON B.BU_NO = R.BU_NO WHERE B.BU_NO = #{buNo}
